info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lea County through 415 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tatum, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tatum, Gladiola and Tatum Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern New Mexico.
